data.title: Southwestern Baptist Theological Seminary
data.meta_description: Are you called to ministry? Find out what's next on your path to vocational ministry. Apply today!
data.text:
At Southwestern Seminary, we are committed to providing ministry leaders with the biblical foundation they need to handle the Word of God with competence and clarity. Moreover, weâ€™re dedicated to equipping our graduates through practical experience, mobilizing our students toward ministry and service opportunities from the moment their studies begin. No matter where God calls you, our faculty and staff will be here to walk alongside you as you develop the knowledge, character, wisdom, and experience you need to thrive in ministry.

When applying to Southwestern Seminary or Texas Baptist College, international students will need to submit the following additional documents:

Transcripts

Course-by-course international transcript evaluation

Church Recommendation

Statement of Financial Support

English Proficiency Test Results

Additional steps for international students can be found here.
